column1: #dig start(4; 4; Center tile of a 7-tile square) This is a 7x7
column2: 2 z-level ramp staircase with 8 up ramps per level. It's a combination of + & x formations. NOTE: Always begin a z-level down from where you want to start. (Ramps are upwards. Thus
column3: you need to start these designations from a z-level below.)
